description: Deceptively hidden as an ordinary quarterstaff, it is actually very powerful, much like the Eldritch who originally possessed it.
attrs: Bonus +10 Intelligence +10 Attack speed +1.25 Mana regeneration +10 Attack damage
info: For strength heroes, it grants 10 attack speed, 120 mana, 1.75 mana regen, 0.7% spell damage and 10 attack damage.
For agility heroes, it grants 10 attack speed, 120 mana, 1.75 mana regen, 0.7% spell damage and 10 attack damage.
For intelligence heroes, it grants 10 attack speed, 120 mana, 1.75 mana regen, 0.7% spell damage and 20 attack damage.
